welcome_message_body: Welcome to Hemet, where you'll find a charming blend of small-town hospitality and natural beauty. Explore our historic downtown, renowned for its antique shops, and be sure to take in the stunning scenery of the nearby San Jacinto Mountains. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: Panera Bread
restaurants.description: Panera Bread is a bakery located in Hemet.

restaurants.name: In-N-Out Burger
restaurants.description: In-N-Out Burger is a fast food restaurant located in Hemet.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal of Ryan Field Airport, where all domestic and international flights depart and arrive.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal handles all freight and cargo shipments at Ryan Field Airport.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network while waiting for their flights.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal of Banning Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Riverside Fla-Bob Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Riverside Fla-Bob Airport handles all air freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Palm Springs Metropolitan Area Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Palm Springs Metropolitan Area Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Riverside Municipal Airport serves all commercial flights and provides amenities for passengers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Riverside Municipal Airport caters to private and chartered flights, offering exclusive services and facilities.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Norton AFB Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Norton AFB Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
